hero.title: MANGALA STONE
hero.subtitle: Bring the beauty of nature into your space with our premium natural stones

projectIntro.heading: Your Project Starts Here
projectIntro.text1: Mangala Stone is your trusted source for premium natural stones, including Andesite Stone, Palem Sandstone, and Wall Cladding.
projectIntro.text2: With two manufacturing sites located in Cirebon and Majalengka, we ensure high quality products and reliable delivery.
projectIntro.text3: Whether you are building elegant facades, stylish landscapes or timeless interiors, our stones combine authentic beauty and expert craftsmanship.
projectIntro.text4: Contact us today to learn more about how Mangala Stone can bring nature’s essence into your space.

andesitePage.introHeading: Discover the Natural Beauty of Andesite Stone
andesitePage.introText: Andesite Stone is a durable natural stone formed from volcanic activity, belonging to the family of extrusive igneous rocks. Originally named after the Andes Mountains in South America which the world’s longest mountain range. This stone is also abundantly found across Indonesia’s volcanic regions. Renowned for its strength, density, and timeless aesthetic, Andesite Stone is highly resistant to weathering, making it ideal for both interior and exterior applications. It is available in a range of natural colours and textures, with multiple surface finishes to suit diverse design preferences. From modern minimalistic projects to traditional architecture, Andesite Stone offers versatility and enduring beauty for paving, wall cladding, landscaping, and other architectural uses.

andesitePage.palem_intro_title: Discover the Natural Beauty of Palem SandStone
andesitePage.palem_intro_text: Palem Sandstone is a natural sandstone ... earthy aesthetics.
andesitePage.palm1_desc: Soft cream and beige hues ... classic styles.
andesitePage.palm3_desc: Perfect for exterior wall cladding ... accent walls.

intro_heading: Discover the Natural Beauty of Wall Cladding
intro_text: Mangala’s wall cladding is crafted from high-quality natural stone such as andesite, palem sandstone, and red sandstone. It offers a perfect combination of durability, elegance, and timeless charm. Designed to enhance interior and exterior spaces, our cladding provides a sophisticated natural aesthetic and long-lasting protection against weathering.
wall1_desc1: Made from natural andesite stone with rugged hand-split texture, durable and weather-resistant.
wall1_desc3: Ideal for both interior and exterior wall cladding applications.
wall2_desc1: Blend of Palem Sandstone and Andesite Stone, balanced tones with refined texture.
wall2_desc3: Perfect for modern architectural facades and interiors.
wall3_desc1: Soft mix of beige, gray, and muted rose hues adding warmth and sophistication.
wall3_desc3: Ideal for interior and exterior applications.
wall4_desc1: Crafted from Palem Sandstone with smooth natural variation and warm tone.
wall4_desc3: Perfect for clean, minimalist architectural designs.
wall5_desc1: Elegant texture with warm color tone and clean horizontal arrangement.
wall5_desc3: Excellent for interior feature walls and exterior facades.
wall6_desc1: Combination of Palem Sandstone, Andesite, and Red Sandstone with balanced tones.
wall6_desc3: Adds depth and visual rhythm to modern architecture.
wall7_desc1: Made from Palem Sandstone in warm tones with rich natural variation.
wall7_desc3: Suitable for both interior and exterior stone designs.
about_para1: Mangala Stone is a trusted manufacturer and distributor of premium natural stone products, specializing in the production and supply of Andesite Stone, Palem Sandstone, and Wall Cladding for various applications.
about_para2: With over a decade of experience since 2014, we operate two manufacturing sites in Cirebon and Majalengka, West Java, a region renowned for its skilled artisans and rich heritage in stone craftsmanship.
about_para3: By combining traditional techniques with modern innovation, we produce natural stones that meet the highest standards of durability, functionality, and aesthetics.
about_para4: At Mangala Stone, we believe natural stone is more than just a building material — it is an essential element that enhances the beauty, longevity, and character of every space.
factory_1: Factory 1: Desa Bobos, Kecamatan Dukupuntang, Kabupaten Cirebon, Jawa Barat, Indonesia
factory_2: Factory 2: Desa Lengkong Wetan, Kecamatan Sindangwangi, Kabupaten Majalengka, Jawa Barat, Indonesia
